It has never been easier to launch a great website on your own. Using a website builder can help you launch a great website for your business. In this article, we cover the top 5 website builders.

If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact Clio Websites.

Getting Started with website builders

When it comes to easily building and launching a website, you need the right tools to work with. Every day, new website builders are popping up online that offer you the ability to make a stunning website in no time, but some might be better than others, particularly depending on your needs.

If you are on the fence about which service to go with, don’t worry. We are going to break down the top five website builders so you can choose the right one for you and your business!

WordPress

Although WordPress is not a traditional website builder (it’s a content management system ‘CMS’) it’s an easy and quick way to start a blog or a website. This classic blogging platform has been around for ages, and it’s perfect for companies who plan on really growing their website over time. If you are looking for a service that lets you start small with room for a complete expansion at a later time, WordPress is great.

You can choose from a wide range of buildable templates that are perfect for making a great website in no time, and if you want to replace your site with something custom at a later date, you can do that too. If you need an expert to help you with your WordPress implementation, reach out to us, or review our WordPress article to find out more.

SquareSpace

As far as modern website builders go, SquareSpace takes the cake. This easy to use platform makes it possible for you to make a completely beautiful website in less than an hour depending on how complex you want to make the setup. It is perfect for creating a website that looks like it was created by a talented developer with a focus on modern design aesthetic. Their building tools and templates are a cut above the rest, and while they do cost more than some other services, it is more than reasonable for everything that you get.

Wix

Wix is a fun and easy to use website builder that allows you to make a simple website in no time at all. Though they lack the notoriety of WordPress, they are able to prove you with a wide range of helpful building tools and customization options that make designing your own website a breeze. If you want something that is simple enough for everyone, but still gives a nice final product, Wix is a user-friendly option that many business professionals love.

SQUARE (formerly Weebly)

When it comes to eCommerce sites, Square makes building your own incredibly simple. This amazing group, powered by the infamous Square, provides an easy website builder that also makes it possible for you to easily add helpful eCommerce features in no time. With this user-friendly and easy to use system, you can create a beautiful professional website that is ready to sell products!

Shopify

This is a website builder that is particularly beneficial for eCommerce users because it immediately creates an online store that looks nice and works well. Unlike other services that are more focused on website building, Shopify is really more of a builder front on top of an amazing eCommerce system that is designed to give you the tools that you need to succeed.

Website Builders – Conclusion

Choosing the right website builder is a matter of finding one that has the kind of style and tools that you are looking for. Each of these services makes it easy for you to create a wonderful website quickly and with no understanding of technical knowledge, but they all have charming differences that make them better for some than others.

Many of these services offer free trials to help you understand what they can do for you, so give them a try and choose the best one!

If you need a custom website or need help setting up one of these platforms, contact Clio to see how we can help.

Choosing Clio Websites Over Website Builders

We have been building and launching great websites since 2007. If you need assistance with a website builder or want to make your website totally unique, we can help.

Here are a few things that set us apart from the competition. Clio Websites:

  • Offers competitive pricing and flexible payment options
  • Is a premier Calgary web design company with WordPress expertise
  • Has years of experience helping small businesses achieve their online goals
  • Spends the time to understand your business needs and requirements
  • Has a very high customer satisfaction and retention rate (over 98%)
  • Prides ourselves on the quality of service we provide to each and every client
  • Is responsive and won’t leave you hanging for days when you need support the most
  • Creates custom websites for each project to separate you from your competition
